name.x-prompt: How would you like to name your application?

directory.description: The directory of the new application.

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting).

libraries.description: Create import aliases for these libraries. (e.g. models, utilities, validators).

serverPort.description: The localhost port used by the server. (e.g., http://localhost:3001).

automatizations.description: File based routing, router based layouts, on demand APIs auto importing and on demand components auto importing.

onDemandSvgIcons.description: On-demand SVG Icons auto importing. (uses the https://iconify.design API and 'src/assets/icons' files).

translationSupport.description: Support to translate the app for multiple languages (uses vue-i18n).

cssFramework.description: Choose an utility based CSS Framework.
